request.title: SNMP Parcel Schema
request.description: SNMP profile parcel schema for POST request

contact.description: Set the contact for this managed node

location.description: Set the physical location of this managed node

name.description: Set the name of the SNMP view

id.description: Configure identifier of subtree of MIB objects

name.description: Set name of the SNMP community

userLabel.description: Set user label of the SNMP community

view.description: Set name of the SNMP view

target.description: Configure SNMP server to receive SNMP traps

vpnId.description: Set VPN in which SNMP server is located

ip.description: Set IPv4/IPv6 address of SNMP server

port.description: Set UDP port number to connect to SNMP server

userLabel.description: Set user label of the SNMP community

communityName.description: Set name of the SNMP community. DEPRECATED. Use userLabel field instead

user.description: Set name of the SNMP user

sourceInterface.description: Source interface for outgoing SNMP traps

documentation.description: This is the documentation for POST request schema for SNMP profile parcel
documentation.details-1: variable name should be present with given format as specified in schema if optionType value is variable
documentation.details-2: variable name should not be present if optionType value is NOT variable
documentation.details-3: when option Type is global,  value should be present with given format/restrictions as specified in schema
documentation.details-4: when option Type is default, value should be present with given default value as specified in schema
